content:
The Dancing Goat
 Folktale 
 English 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 One day, a goat went out in the bush, and wandered around hapily. 
 
 But then she got lost! 
 
 
 1  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Sudenly, she met a wolf! The wolf came up to her, and he loked 
 
 very hungry. 
 
 
 2  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The goat said: Mr. Wolf, I know you want to eat me. But I would like to 
 
 die hapy! 
 
 
 3  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The wolf asked the goat: 
 
 What do you mean? Die 
 
 hapy? How? 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The goat answered: If I 
 
 have to die, I would like to 
 
 die dancing! 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 5  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Then the wolf tok his 
 
 guitar. He sat down and 
 
 started playing it. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 And the goat started 
 
 dancing, though she was 
 
 stil a litle bit woried. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 7  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Near that place, there were dogs. They came to se what was 
 
 hapening. 
 
 
 8  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Now that wolf was afraid of dogs. So he turned and ran away! 
 
 
 
 9  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 And the goat kept on 
 
 dancing, because now she 
 
 was fre from the wolf! 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 10
